rules_text:
[i]Unreal[/i] – At the beginning of your combat, choose up to one. Instead choose any number if a permanent phased in or was created under your control this turn.
• Attach this artifact to target creature you control.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature.
• Target creature phases out. [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)[/i]
